Container.Name: bibliogram
Container.Overview:
Bibliogram is an alternative front-end for Instagram
This requires the addition of a config.js file within the /mnt/user/appdata/bibliogram directoy Before starting the container for the first time run these commands within the terminal cd /mnt/user/appdata/ mkdir bibliogram nano config.js
Copy in the contents of the config.js located from https://git.sr.ht/~cadence/bibliogram/tree/master/item/config.js Save, close and run the container
